Compatible with iOS 8 - 12
Bolders: Bigger, bolder folders!

Bolders is a lightweight tweak designed to extend stock folders to the edge of every screen without disrupting the established aesthetics of iOS; Enjoy more apps per page, a quick count of the contents, all without friction in a smooth-as-stock interface.

Configure options from Settings.

1.2.2-2 Hotfix: Workaround for devices experiencing safe mode from 1.2.2. 1.2.1 → 1.2.2 - Fixed label issues with near-white backgrounds. 1.2 → 1.2.1 - Fixed wiggle folder icon stretch. - Fixed folder open animation badge clip. 1.1.1-1 → 1.2

- Added sliders to control label transparency.
- Clarified some settings.
- Compiled in support for arm64e!
- Fixed the folder close animation!

PrimalFolder Compatibility Note: You may need to disable "Display To Folder As Icon" from that tweak after updating.
1.0.1 → 1.1.1

- Much of Bolders can now be configured from Settings > Bolders, please do so after you install.

--- 1.0:

- Now with help from IconSupport, folders should preserve/restore the layout across reboots
